SELECT CLUB_NO ,USER_NO ,CLUB_NAME ,CLUB_LIMIT ,CLUB_CREATEDATE ,CLUB_DISCRIPT ,CLUB_IMG ,CLUB_LOCATION ,CLUB_IMG ,CLUB_COUNT ,CASE WHEN (select to_date(SYSDATE, 'YY-MM-DD') from dual) - (select to_date(CLUB_CREATEDATE, 'YY-MM-DD') from dual) > 30 THEN 0 WHEN (select to_date(SYSDATE, 'YY-MM-DD') from dual) - (select to_date(CLUB_CREATEDATE, 'YY-MM-DD') from dual) < 30 THEN 1 END AS "newCount" FROM CLUB WHERE CLUB_STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY CLUB_NO DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE "GROUP" SET GROUP_COUNT = ( GROUP_COUNT + 1 ) WHERE GROUP_NO = #{ groupNo } AND GROUP_STATUS = 'Y'
mapper.select: SELECT GROUP_NO ,M.NICKNAME ,GROUP_TITLE ,GROUP_NUM ,GROUP_CREATEDATE ,GROUP_DESCRIBE ,GROUP_DAY ,GROUP_LOCATION ,GROUP_IMG ,GROUP_COUNT ,(select count(*) from group_like where group_no = 13) as "likeCount" FROM "GROUP" G JOIN MEMBER M ON(G.USER_NO = M.USER_NO) WHERE GROUP_NO = ${ groupNo } AND GROUP_STATUS = 'Y'
